xz42_bb26.client.view.chatwindow

Interface IChatWindow2Model<T>


  • public interface IChatWindow2Model<T>
    Mini-View2Model adapter that enables the mini-view (chat window) to communicate to the model.
    Author:
    bb26, xc7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IChatWindow2Model<?> NULL_OBJECT
      No-op "null" adapter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteWindow(ChattingWindow cw) 
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get name of this chatroom
      void invite(java.lang.String ip)
      Invite the user with the remote IP address to join the chatroom.
      void quit()
      Broadcast to every current member in the chatroom to remove my stub from their local chatrooms.
      void sendMsg(java.lang.String text)
      Send a message to every user in the chatroom.
      void speakTo(T user)
      Speak to the given user in this chatroom.
      void startGame()
      Start a game from client side, need to be implemented when necessary.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_OBJECT

        static final IChatWindow2Model<?> NULL_OBJECT
        No-op "null" adapter

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get name of this chatroom
        Returns:
        a string which is the name of this chatroom

      • quit

        void quit()
        Broadcast to every current member in the chatroom to remove my stub from their local chatrooms. Then delete the local chatroom in my model.

      • sendMsg

        void sendMsg(java.lang.String text)
        Send a message to every user in the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        text - the message to send over

      • invite

        void invite(java.lang.String ip)
        Invite the user with the remote IP address to join the chatroom. The remote user will create a local copy of the chatroom and broadcast to existing users in the chatroom to add the remote user's stub into their local chatrooms.
        Parameters:
        ip - the remote IP address of the remote user

      • deleteWindow

        void deleteWindow(ChattingWindow cw)

      • speakTo

        void speakTo(T user)
        Speak to the given user in this chatroom. This is done by calling the chatWith method with the user's IP address.
        Parameters:
        user - the specific user to speak to in this chatroom

      • startGame

        void startGame()
        Start a game from client side, need to be implemented when necessary.
